name: the man from the backyard 2
description:
continue the story in the man from the backyard 2. you are home alone and find out that the hitman is still aliveand trying to kill you.

feel free to leave a comment and rate my game.

 you can follow me than you never miss a new game.

controls
  • WASD to move
  • E to interact
  • ESC to pause
how to install
  1. download the game
  2. extract the game
  3. open the folder
  4. click on the man from the backyard 2.exe
  5. have fun with playing :)
